cause.description:
China has occpied Tibet since 1951 and has commited numoros acts of genocide as well as atrocitys unimaginable they continue to seek the anialation of the tibetan culture particularly the Tibetan Buddhist Ideas art teachings and ceromony as well as Soaking up Tibets natural resorces and Forceing the native population into a state of poverty in which they have littel control over there own land and Goverment.
1. Free the Tibetans from Oppretion
2. Reinstate the True ruler of Tibet His Holiness the Dalai Lama
3. Make this problem known to the rest of the world
cause.mission: Stop the Political and Religous opretion of China over tibet
cause.name: Free Tibet
